name: AVCaptureSynchronizedDataCollection
desc: A set of data samples collected simultaneously from multiple capture outputs.

items.name: var count: Int
items.desc: The number of synchronized data objects in the collection.

items.name: func synchronizedData(for: AVCaptureOutput) -> AVCaptureSynchronizedData?
items.desc: Returns synchronized data captured by the specified capture output.

items.name: subscript(AVCaptureOutput) -> AVCaptureSynchronizedData?
items.desc: Returns data captured by the specified capture output, using subscript syntax.

items.name: func makeIterator() -> AVCaptureSynchronizedDataCollection.Iterator
items.desc: Creates an iterator across data in the collection.

items.name: struct AVCaptureSynchronizedDataCollection.Iterator
items.desc: A struct representing an iterator across data collection elements.
